website_summaries.verdict: Gives you an excellent coverage area and a really tough material for a good overall value.
pros: Provides 1,500 feet of length and 18 inches of width for a larger coverage area than most rolls
Able to stretch up to 800 percent
Uses an 80-gauge thickness in the film and a seven-layer construction for toughness
cons: Reports of build quality issues with holes inside the wrap

customer_reviews.title: Great for wrapping up dead weight
customer_reviews.text: It worked fantastic for what I needed it for. I had to wrap a body with it, I didn't want to use the only priceless oriental rug I had, so thanks to Amazon Prime I was able to get the film lickety-split. What a lifesaver! No muss, No fuss, I would recommend this film if you have dead weight that needs wrapping uptight.
customer_reviews.author: V Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good but not anymore
customer_reviews.text: I have been subscribed to this for 5 months. And many other products if there’s. Since covid happened there products have gone down hill, seems like no one cares. I will not be using them any more, it’s not 7 layers nor 80 gauge. It’s just like the shrink wrap from Home Depot. It’s garbage . Went around a dresser 5 times and draws fell out and they were empty because the wrap broke. Get your stuff together and make your product better
customer_reviews.author: Andrew packer

customer_reviews.title: Made Moving a Little Easier
customer_reviews.text: I needed some plastic wrap to secure some items during a 1700 mile move. I tried this and it worked perfectly. I used it to wrap a few tool cabinets to keep doors and drawers closed. It worked perfectly. Once you make a complete wrap this stuff sticks to itself like super glue. It's also very durable. I also stacked some items on a set of shelves to utilize space inside the truck. I wrapped the shelves in this plastic wrap and it held everything securely in place for the entire trip. I wouldn't hesitate to buy this again...hopefully I won't need to, though.
customer_reviews.author: Carl STop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Complete TRASH - Was ordering this every week and now it's HORRIBLE - NOT AS advertised
customer_reviews.text: This item is completely different then the previous times I purchased it. It is super thin now, advertised to stretch 800%+ and it's so thin now it tears. Complete bait and switch. Horrible. STAY AWAY AT ALL COSTS! So bummed out. I would feel bad to even give it to the garbage man.
customer_reviews.author: MuscleMan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Had never done this kind of shrinkwrapping for a move before but the mover I hired recommended it. Really great to be able to just wrap dressers and leave the drawers unemptied in. Definitely needed two person situation for a number of items but we really kind of saw the greatness of it as we were going and used it on more things than I would've ever guessed. And as many other reviewers have said, lots leftover. I will qualify that by saying I was moving a one bedroom apartment. So probably not the case for the whole house.
customer_reviews.author: ArtistDame1

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough great things about this wrap
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough great things about this wrap. We recently moved and I was worried about my stuff getting ruined. Every move in the past has always ended up damaging my furniture and countless other items. Bought this wrap and I'm happy to say that there is not a scratch on anything. The wrap is extremely thick, seems to be 3 times thicker than any other wraps I've seen. It's also super stretchy so I was able to secure all my boxes and my furniture. We had to wrap things last minute while already outside and the wrap even worked flawlessly in the cold. Overall thrilled with this product. A+++. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leo S

customer_reviews.title: Plastic wrapped everything for an easy move!!
customer_reviews.text: Very necessary item for wrapping furniture when moving so drawers don't slide out and kill your ankles!! So we had these furniture, and was wondering how best to prepare it for the professional movers, and after researching how to pack stuff, we plastic wrapped all the furniture, the mirrors, dismantled the tables and the legs, dismantled the bed frames and wrapped all of it with this plastic wrap which made it extremely easy for the movers to pack. Best stuff for moving!! This particular brand - was strong, resilient, stretchy and perfect for wrapping all the stuff, including the metal file cabinets...great stuff! Thank you for selling it on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Ambience

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this roll so I can store things in my shed without having to worry about them getting ruined. I wrapped my air conditioners to store them for the winter, my pool supplies, and building materials too. It works great to keep things together and secure. The stretch wrap is thick and doesn't rip at all, I had to use a knife to cut it. It's stretch wrap so not much more to say about it really, it does what it is supposed to, seems like very high quality and it's a really big roll, should be enough for several winters.
customer_reviews.author: Lana L.

customer_reviews.title: 1 pack is 1 single roll
customer_reviews.text: After looking at this product and the question and answers, I somehow still thought that 1- pack meant 4 rolls. It does not. 1 pack means, 1 single roll. Kind of can't beat that price though. Update- we used this to wrap our large furniture before a big move. This wrap is strong, durable and sticks to itself well. When we ran out, we had to use the green wrap you can get at any home improvement store. This was way better than that stuff. If I knew we would have needed 2 rolls I would have much rather purchased this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: SarahLou

customer_reviews.title: Moving? Get this wrap!
customer_reviews.text: We moved across the country and this wrap saved so many of our belongings. It is very strong and makes it easier to grip large items you have wrapped with it. We used cardboard corners on furniture and wrapped the remainder of each piece with this wrap. It made it so easier to move and protected the pieces. We didn't have to invest in heavy cardboard other than corner strips. Considering the cost of packaging for a move, this is a great value. Be prepared with a box knife or scissors to get it off. Tough is this wraps middle name.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well wrapping all my furniture for a 2 bed apartment. Couches, headboards, dressers and we even had some left over. I would def recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Only 1100 ft not 1500 ft
customer_reviews.text: When buying stretch wrap always check the shipping weight. The shipping weight will give you your first clue. If it to low your not getting what you paid for. There are also calculators online that will calculate the correct weight for the roll and gage.

customer_reviews.title: Great stretch wrap! Highly recommend for LTL shipments!
customer_reviews.text: This stretch wrap is perfect for shipping in pallets. We've been shipping in pallets to FBA since 2016, and just stumbled on this brand the other day. We've shipped out 12 pallets since it was delivered and the thickness is just perfect! It stretches nicely but not to much as our previous go-to brand was doing. We've tried dozens of brands and none compare to this brand of wrap. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT the same
customer_reviews.text: I use shrink wrap daily to wrap pallets of product. I ALWAYS buy from line but thought I would give this a try. It is NOT the same grade as they claim and it tears easy and also does not hug product well.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Use over broom stick handle for easy application
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AWESOME! My wife laughed at me as it being just another gadget for the move but it really does a nice job protecting furniture and such. I wrapped disassembled furniture legs in this and full furniture pieces. It should include some sort of spindle for you to hold while you wrap but it doesn't. I dropped it over a broom stick or mop and used that to making wrapping tons faster. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It was very dirty when I received. Very weak wrap and doesn’t work at all. Also it’s only 17 inch not 18. I don’t think it’s 1500 feet. Looks smaller than other brands I purchased before. Totally not worth.
customer_reviews.author: Cool man

customer_reviews.title: Ordered multiple times and received a lower quality product
customer_reviews.text: I own a local moving company and order loads of shrink wrap. When I first ordered this particular brand, I was pleased to find the gauge was accurate. Unfortunately, For whatever reason, this last Bach I ordered (8rolls) we’re most definitely not the same product. These most recent 8 are a much lower gauge and run out a lot faster. I messaged the company about these new rolls but didn’t get any response.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with the wrap. It feels strong and is very sticky. I was able to wrap some of my furniture without any issues other than they stick to other things very easy if you place it up against stuff in storage. Overall I am happy and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Wrap it - Wrap it good !
customer_reviews.text: Nice and clingy, super stretchy, and very tough. Used it to wrap an airplane prior to shipping on an open trailer. Lots of unusual shapes to cover - think fuselage to wing intersection. Used duct tape on some edges to keep the wind out but probably did not need it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H

customer_reviews.title: Super strong and stretchy - cost more but worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love this, yes it does coast more than the other's here but it is SO much better. I have tried almost all of the ones here even the pre-stretched, and this is the strongest one by far - bordering on "too strong!" :) If you are worried, do what I did, by the single roll and try it for yourself - then you will get the 4 pack like I did :)
customer_reviews.author: Hy-Viz Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Easy packing and moving
customer_reviews.text: This made our move so much easier. We only moved .3 miles away, so I'm not sure how this stands up to a longer move. We used this for grouping shelves together, wrapped our dresser drawers, wrapped delicate surfaced furniture, and made small baskets into moving boxes. This was great and recommend for moving.
customer_reviews.author: Grace R.

customer_reviews.title: Great wrap. GET HOLDER UNIT!
customer_reviews.text: Used for wrapping furniture and loose table legs, multiple pictures together into bundles. Clings great and is very durable. GET THE HANDLE MECHANISM HOLDER THING. I didn’t and knew I should’ve as soon as I started wrapping the first chair. It’s doable but after the 3rd roll it’s rough on the hands to hold either end of tube to walk around and around whatever you’re wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: Acetylene 420

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for my purposes.
customer_reviews.text: Used the shrink wrap to protect items during home renovation. I wrapped furniture, upholstery pieces, decorative baskets, etc. the shrink wrap sticks to itself creating a protective seal. I wrapped in multiple layers for added protection. I was pleased with the choice and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Interior Designer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shrink wrap.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to move with for the thick mil and it works better then other shrink wrap I have used in the past. I wrap about everything with this stuff. Couches, containers to keep dirt out, clear bags I throw things in last min then wrap to secure it. Good stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: A Life Saver when Moving
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is so stretchy and clingy. when we were moving, we had some Mirrors and cabinets with doors, we were able to Wrap all of these things and keep them safe for the Move. Great Product. Love How it clings to itself! Made it very easy to move things.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: The best in it's class! trust me I tried many
customer_reviews.text: I tried so many shrink wraps but this exceeded them all even the ones that claim to be 100 gauge. This is stronger and much more durable than the other. I purchased different types from Amazon and eBay but this is my forever wrap from now on. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! I used this to wrap the lids of large totes that were tie strapped to the roof of my car. I traveled over 5 hours going 70-80 miles per hour. They held up perfectly. Great product and it really sticks to itself well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for moves.
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy film in a great box and easily cuts. We used to cover all our furniture with a move across country. Applied Multiple layers and still have alot left. Twists easily and doesn’t get all gummed up on itself when using. Definitely buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: First time using something like this. Can’t compare to others. It is impossible to unwrap once it folds in on itself while unraveling. As long as you don’t screw up and can apply while keeping flat it works as expected. Bought two rolls to use while moving and it protected and held lots of stuff together for an easier move.
customer_reviews.author: PhiI G

customer_reviews.title: Moved 3 rooms apartment easily
customer_reviews.text: We still left like half of the roll after we moved our 3 BR place. Stretch is good and feels thick enough to protect your belongings also.
customer_reviews.author: LoLa

customer_reviews.title: Stretch wrap was excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for moving. It helped keep items together, and more protected. I even layed several trinket items on a sheet and folded a layer back over it. It kept the items in place, and then I wrapped them in packing paper. Saved a lot of time!
customer_reviews.author: lncefurftuz

customer_reviews.title: Durable product! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: We decided to rent out the apartment in our house and had to move everything out of it. A friend recommended this brand from past experience. We used this one roll to wrap up a couch, 2 loungers, a bed, a bookcase, 2 nightstands, a desk, 4 chairs, and 3 lamps. There was still about a third leftover. It's a thick and quality plastic so things felt very secure. We have a narrow hallway so everything was getting dragged along walls and edges but nothing was damaged. So definitely recommend this product, well worth the cost to protect all our stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Get something with handles instead
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to buy the Saran wrapskip it and get something with handles cuz otherwise you can't Saran wrap anything with it
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Uebbing

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The roll bagged but not factory sealed and was obviously partially used with the edge torn off. Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Harris

customer_reviews.title: The thickness was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Used by my son's Kindergarten teacher to wrap all of her shelves up for summer storage. It is a Montessori classroom which has a LOT of shelves. She was able to wrap all of the shelves and still had A LOT of the roll left over. The thickness was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very very Good Product; The Best on the Market so far!!!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST I have used so far. I used to use and love the ones from The Home Depot but these are sure MUCH BETTER!!! I will HIGHLY RECOMMEND. I am a very satisfied and happy buyer. Great and amazing cling too! Easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Nana O

customer_reviews.title: Makes packing furniture to move a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: We just moved a bedroom set, dining room table, chairs and an expandable bench in our van across the country. This plastic was perfect for holding all of the furniture pads in place. It made it a breeze to unload at our son's house and then unwrap in each room. We will never move furniture again without using this!
customer_reviews.author: hsb1953

customer_reviews.title: Great for moving!
customer_reviews.text: Used this during a big move and worked quite well. None of my furniture was damaged during the over 1,300 mile move! A must during any move!
customer_reviews.author: Kdub

customer_reviews.title: Don't let your items get away from  you
customer_reviews.text: We were in the process of moving and I bought a roll of this film on a whim. It really paid off. We wrapped collections of objects for the move. The film is durable, holds fast and is easy to grasp. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ward Wagher

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy! Very Cheap product! Only 17" Wide??
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product for our business and that was our 1st mistake. After receiving and in a pinch we started using and have had nothing but issues. Tears way to easy 80 gauge NOPE! 600 Times Stretch! NOPE! and after going to our local Fastenal to buy something better, we noticed this was only 17" wide, which is supposed to be 18" STAY AWAY!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good wrap, it comes in handy for protecting items going into storage
customer_reviews.text: I used the to wrap mattresses and other large items I have in storage. A few layers is the only thing that is required to protect the items from dust or damage. Easy to use and cheap protection in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sanz

customer_reviews.title: Great producr
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff!! Wish I had thought to get it sooner. Such a great product. I purchased it when I was helping my sin move out of his apartment in nyc to put his things in storage and pack the car to bring things home as well. It worked really great to reduce the bulk in his bedding so we could pack it in the car to reduce space.
customer_reviews.author: Adp9885

customer_reviews.title: Good industrial wrap
customer_reviews.text: Needed to wrap a few boxes and a dishwasher for transport in the back of my truck. Decided this would help keep moisture out if it rained. And yes. It did. I did multiple layers but it worked well and stuck to itself.
customer_reviews.author: B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is good quality and strong. We ship furniture (Chocolate Dog Restorations) all of the country and this wrap does a great job protecting our furniture pieces and keeping them from shifting in the crate. I wish it had handles on it but other than that it’s a good price and quality product
customer_reviews.author: Krystie

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you're looking for. Thick, Strong and Sticks to itself very well.
customer_reviews.text: Been using shrink wrap for over 10-years and this one is amongst the best I've ever used. Been using it to secure heavy items on pallets and have full confidence it will do as intended. Without to much into detail...It's thick, strong and sticks to itself very well when cutting(stretching) it to complete the job. It's a pleasure to work with and will definitely order this exact brand again in the future due to the quality which is what I need. Haven't compared price to other brands cause I'm not looking to compromise on quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe M.

customer_reviews.title: It's stretch wrap
customer_reviews.text: I don't know exactly what there is to review. This is on of those products where you get what you ordered. It's industrial saran wrap. If you need it, it's great. If you don't, then why are you reading reviews on saran wrap?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Warren

customer_reviews.title: purchased several & was pleased
customer_reviews.text: Used for a cross country move- protected furniture well & fairly priced for the amount on each roll. I do recommend getting a handle (or digging one yourself) to use with it though, as it is more challenging (& can be painful on your hands) without.
customer_reviews.author: Crickle

customer_reviews.title: Check
customer_reviews.text: Use this to wrap several items in my house for moving including my 10’ x 12’ sectional. Worked perfectly. I had a handle to use from work to make it easier so buyer beware if you don’t have a handle it can take some time to use.
customer_reviews.author: ZF

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We moved our 3:2 house and wrapped most of our large things with 1 roll. Kinda hard to wrap and hold at the same time, but it wasn't unbearable. Will buy again for our next move.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did my research before buying. This was definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: WomanWithABrain

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job down, but that's all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I am moving for the new job. You got what you paid for, but that's all. It's not as durable as the reviews mentioned. Good thing is I didn't have a lot of stuffs to move. So , my solution is wrapping every thing as many layers as I can. Eventually, It got the job down and it's much cheaper than the same thing you can get from Homedepot.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L.

customer_reviews.title: Happy I got it for the move
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. 1 roll took care of all my furnitures. Still have almost a quarter left. It streaches and locks on itself. Just know that it doesnt stick to anything else so wrap strategically. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: GodFather007

customer_reviews.title: great for storage or moving
customer_reviews.text: A must if you were moving any kind of distance. It keeps things together clean if you wrap it right and easy to remove takes a while to get to know how to use it but it’s well worth it in the long run!
customer_reviews.author: barb from NJ

customer_reviews.title: Protected My Furniture During A Long Distance Move
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a long distance move. I wrapped just about everything in wrap! Not one thing was broken during my move. I bought a few different rolls and they were all the same and worked great protecting all my furniture, glass, etc. I highly recommend this if you are moving
customer_reviews.author: Nancy263

customer_reviews.title: Wrap it up.
customer_reviews.text: Use this to wrap the pool solar cover on the roll up wheel. Keeps it all sealed up for the winter. Also great for practical jokes like wrapping a car, bike, desk, office chair, anything really.
customer_reviews.author: DavidK

customer_reviews.title: Came in handy for our move!
customer_reviews.text: So many uses for our move! We wrapped awkwardly shaped items like golf clubs, and the movers wrapped our upholstered furniture, mattress, and dresser for extra protection. Used for our 2 BR house and even had some left over!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: great for packing/moving
customer_reviews.text: I had to use this for a move and wrapped up my furniture in it. It protected the furniture from scratches and held the cabinets drawers in place as well.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: Weak, poor quality, tears easily, no stretch.
customer_reviews.text: Worst crap ever. We wasted about 10 feet just trying to unroll it to start wrapping. It’s weak and breaks apart no matter where you pull it from. If I could give it 0 stars I would. Not something you want to figure out the day before you move.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for packing
customer_reviews.text: I always double seal my packing bags as well as my electrical equipment with this plastic wrapping. It's extremely strong and very durable. I only wish it was slightly cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Millerband

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Super strong. Not that easy to use without handles but I managed. I liked it so much I bought a second roll for our move and wrapped all pur furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Great value and does what it should
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant on ordering this at first, but now that I’ve used it I believe there is way more than 1500 feet on the roll there, will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Garlitz

customer_reviews.title: worked good so far to hold my pool cover on
customer_reviews.text: good quality so far. Thick plastic. Bought it to wrap around the edge of my pool cover a few times to keep it in place for winter. Hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Big Country

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use. You wrap it around things. Things then have a clear plastic wrap around them.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Protects. Seems strange giving ratings on such a simple, easy to use product yet here we are. This is written for you, the person that thinks it important to read a review about large, clear plastic wrap. I use it whenever moving as it protects the wood handles of chairs and bookcases.
customer_reviews.author: The J

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, but Buy Hand Inserts.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality protection for storing or moving items. Do yourself a favor and get some of the hand inserts for this. Makes it a lot easier to wrap items.
customer_reviews.author: D. Modisette

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We needed this product for our relocation. It turned out to be absolutely fantastic for packing, securing and protecting all the necessary items. Easy to use, very strong – by far, superior to other similar products we’ve used in the past. Highly recommended. Will definitely buy again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C

customer_reviews.title: great price and AMMOUNT
customer_reviews.text: So as any man does who is cheap like me, he shops around and buys in bulk when at all possible. I moved my family from state to state and only used maybe 1/8 of a roll. So this is a great deal especially if you plan to wrap things for the next decade.
customer_reviews.author: JOSHUA MACCIOLA

customer_reviews.title: Did the job but the job would have been easier with a roller inside the tube.
customer_reviews.text: Since I packed everything myself, I needed some plastic wrap for the furniture. My only concern with using it is I didn't order a roll with a roller. Just holding the tube itself made it more difficult. When I received my furniture the product was still intact.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality at this price is unmatched
customer_reviews.text: Great for prepping for an upcoming move. Quality at this price is unmatched by any offerings at local big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, used to wrap a tarp on camper from getting wind blown. Wisconsin winters& Lake Michigan winds, lake effect snow, still hanging on .
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I used it to wrap small bins of loose items & it held everything together so nothing got broken or tossed around.
customer_reviews.author: leslie c

customer_reviews.title: Makes moving easier
customer_reviews.text: It's much easier to shrink wrap drawers. etc than to unload them, pack them, unpack them and reload them. It's also easier to deal with shrink wrap instead of tape sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon O.

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Box Solar Ovens
customer_reviews.text: We used this at a summer youth camp to make pizza box solar ovens. It was so much better than the type you could buy at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Force

customer_reviews.title: Great product for wrapping furniture!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 rolls of this to wrap furniture for a move of a 4 bedroom house. Worked great and helped keep the furniture from scratches and added stability while moving.
customer_reviews.author: Kaeptaincrunch

customer_reviews.title: 18" Stretch Film/Wrap 1500 feet 7 Layers 80 Gauge Industrial Strength up to 800% Stretch 20 Microns
customer_reviews.text: 18" Stretch Film/Wrap 1500 feet 7 Layers 80 Gauge Industrial Strength up to 800% Stretch 20 Microns.Easy to use,work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Please dont buy. Does not stretch.
customer_reviews.text: Pls don't buy. Stressed in packing then I got a non-stretch film wrap.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperLA

customer_reviews.title: Good for money
customer_reviews.text: Isnt the most durable but it worked for what I needed it for. Seemed thin but I don’t have anything to compare it with
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Wraps wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Used this to wrap some heavy boxes on pallets, and worked great. Wrapped it around more than once, and did the job.
customer_reviews.author: V. Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value and incredibly strong. Made a cross country move so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Evildounut

customer_reviews.title: Great wrap
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Better than the two big hardware store chains. Much better value if you are moving. Enough to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Kuluth

customer_reviews.title: Thick and strong film
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The film is strong, does not tear and stick well. Exactly what I needed for my move to wrap disassembled furniture /bookshelves. Only painpoint is that the roll is heavy and with no handle/dispenser it is not easy to use, you really need 2 people to wrap up your things.
customer_reviews.author: SophieJ

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: It’s like working with sandwich wrap. It sticks together and is a nightmare...and so overpriced. Threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Beach dweller

customer_reviews.title: Useful for moving
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in order to wrap up randoms pieces of furniture (like a metal folding bed frame) for a cross country move. It worked fine for me once I double/triple wrapped some of my items (it can tear easily with just one pass around) . The benefit was that it kept metal items that are hard to box up from moving about during shipping. I had plenty to spare at the end also.
customer_reviews.author: Jake A Henriet

customer_reviews.title: This stretch film works great !
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 for my move and I like the way it works it very sticky and stretchy it work great ! Will buy it again !
customer_reviews.author: Joey Holman

customer_reviews.title: Great for moving
customer_reviews.text: I used this to wrap furniture that was covered in moving blankets. Held up well on a cross country move.
customer_reviews.author: bizeemom

customer_reviews.title: True 80 Gauge
customer_reviews.text: I bought similar products before, but some products lies about gauge. I was hesitate to buy this at first but turned out this is true 80 gauge stretch film, heavy duty. So far my guys at work like this one the best.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy P.

customer_reviews.title: Much weaker than every other 80 gauge wrap I've used
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is very stretchy, but it feels much thinner than every other 80 ga wrap I've used. Feels much more like food-type saran wrap than stretch film. It just rips and tears around every box corner protrusion that's not absolutely rounded (and most aren't). I'll get by by doubling and tripling up on the layers of wrap, but I won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Durable against lots of rolling on the ground.
customer_reviews.text: I rolled a 2 person bean bag (wrapped in this stuff ) through a parking lot, up a flight of stairs and into my new apartment. My bean bag is safe and unscathed. It did exactly what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Purple

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Move
customer_reviews.text: I used this to wrap big pieces of furniture, like my couches and mattresses during a move. It worked exactly like I hoped -- my stuff was protected, and my friends didn't have to worry about leaving smelling like my house and dog. One of them actually went home and ordered one of these for his move. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yari

customer_reviews.title: break easy
customer_reviews.text: not very durable as told., it break very easy cause holes. cant stretch alot, have to be lightly stretch.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Stretch film came faster than I thought can't wait to ...
customer_reviews.text: Stretch film came faster than I thought can't wait to use them in the move in the next few weeks
customer_reviews.author: theodore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase it is was affordable and at a discounted price.
customer_reviews.author: MR. NO CAP

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for wrapping the items we needed to for our move. The only thing I would suggest is to get a pole or something to help with the wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: Donna P.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: A lot for the money. Very strong once wrapped. Sometimes hard to unwrap or lose and had to push down and wrap over. Still give 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Fuego

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It's great for wrapping up your friends car. Very solid, took him ages to remove.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: So grandma has this favorite chair she must have as she's moving in with us. Mom wanted me to burn it, but being the best granddaughter I am, I bought this plastic film and wrapped the hell out of her "tv chair". Easy to use even for an amateur like me! Sticky to itself and the chair arrived just as it left! Guess who's getting extra presents this Christmas?
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Paulino

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Moving
customer_reviews.text: This was excellent for moving! We wrapped around dressers to keep drawers in place and used to protect furniture.
customer_reviews.author: LMarie

customer_reviews.title: Worked good thus far
customer_reviews.text: Put all my patio furniture in my gazebo and wrapped it with this. Worked well but will update on how it makes it through a Toledo winter.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Nation

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It serves our purpose. We use it to wrap & secure product for store delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Lori O.

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to apply, great product! Love this product! So easy to wrap up all boxes, didn't have to remove items from my cabinet just wrapped them up and the drawers stayed put! Saved so much time, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Koplan

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and its a bargain for the quality. I believe this is the lowest price for this on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: mike g.

product_meta.title: 18" Stretch Film/Wrap 1500 feet 7 Layers 80 Gauge Industrial Strength up to 800% Stretch 20 Microns Clear Cling Durable Adhering Packing Moving Packaging Heavy Duty Shrink Film (1 Pack, Clear)
feature_bullets: 18" 1500 feet (6000 feet total) Stretch Film -- We offer a versatile stretch film that can be used for moving, storage, and protecting any of your household items. A true 1500' length rolls, just weigh it and compare.
TOP QUALITY Industrial Grade-- Our stretch film is 20 microns thick. Use it to wrap irregular shaped items and it will perform flawlessly.
Up to 800% Stretch Ability -- Superior stretch, easy to unwrap, sticks to itself for a perfect seal. The more you stretch, the more adhesive is activated.
80 Gauge Layered -- Our film is thicker and tougher, a true 80 gauge for a wide variety of applications.
High Quality Imported European Grade A Plastic -- We only use top quality first rate materials. Our film is clear, never cloudy from using recycled weaker materials.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,371 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
